DOC.brief_summary: Observational ancillary study PRETTINEO study ( ClinicalTrials.gov Identifier : NCT01490580 ) multicenter double blind randomize control trial compare `` atropine+propofol '' v `` atropine+atracurium+sufentanil '' premedication prior endotracheal intubation neonate . Primary outcome : - Cerebral desaturation define rScO2 delta > 20 % baseline value ( premedication ) . - Variation 10 % cerebral FTOE ( Fractional Tissue Oxygen Extraction ) premedication , calculate rScO2 pulse oximetry formula FTOE=SaO2 - rScO2/SaO2 . Hypothesis : `` atropine + propofol '' compare `` atropine+atracurium+sufentanil '' increase frequency cerebral hypoxemia .
DOC.brief_title: Cerebral NIRS Profiles During Premedication Neonatal Intubation
DOC.criteria: Corrected age < 45 week gestational age Currently hospitalize neonatal intensive care unit Requiring semiurgent elective intubation Equipped reliable permeable IV line Parental consent Lack parental consent Parental refusal Sedative anesthetic treatment previous 24 hour Hemodynamic compromise define mean blood pressure < correct GA and/or refill time > 3 second Upper airway malformation Lifethreatening situation require immediate intubation Inclusion another trial permit participation Impossibility establish venous access Any contraindication experimental drug Skin lesion burn forehead
